title: Baoxiao Dahua 2
synopsis: When Zhi Zun Bao learned that he was reincarnated as Monkey King, not only had to transform into a monkey and become a monk, but also protect the Tang monk from the west to learn scriptures, and his heart became angry. In order to get rid of the bizarre reincarnation disaster, holding the moonlight treasure box in his hand, he resolutely decided to cross the Tang Dynasty, grab the scripture number, and stop the story of the trip to the west. (translated from youku)
